content: Which iconic British rock band released albums titled 'A Night at the Opera' and 'A Day at the Races'?

I believe the iconic British rock band you're referring to is Queen. They released the album "A Night at the Opera" in 1975, which includes the classic song "Bohemian Rhapsody." Following that, they released "A Day at the Races" in 1976. Both album titles are references to classic Ealing Studios comedies.
